item.title: Common Commands
item.description: Database # DBSIZE # DBSIZE Return the number of keys in the currently-selected database. see also redis.io. FLUSHALL # FLUSHALL [ASYNC | SYNC] Remove all keys from all database. see also redis.io. FLUSHDB # FLUSHDB [ASYNC | SYNC] Remove all keys from the current database. see also redis.io. SELECT # SELECT index Change the selected database for the current connection. see also redis.io. Key # KEYS # KEYS pattern Returns all keys matchingÂ pattern.

item.title: Transations
item.description: Usage # > MULTI OK > INCR foo QUEUED > INCR bar QUEUED > EXEC 1) (integer) 1 2) (integer) 1 DISCARD # > SET foo 1 OK > MULTI OK > INCR foo QUEUED > DISCARD OK > GET foo "1" Optimistic locking using check-and-set # WATCH mykey val = GET mykey val = val + 1 MULTI SET mykey $val EXEC It is also possible to use the UNWATCH command manually in order to flush all the watched keys.
